name: AFRICAN BLACK SOAP
description: 100% Natural made in West Africa. The Aroma and Deep rich color result from centuries old extraction process that blends Palm Oil, Kern Oil and Shea together resulting in a FINEST skin cleaner available. Black Soap, also known as African Black Soap has long been used to heal problem skin. Its good for thinning fine lines, evening out dark spots, eczema, razor bumps and eliminating blemishes. It is also used to lightly exfoliate and give you healthier looking skin. The soap can also be used on your body or hair or for oily skin, dry skin, skin rashes, scalp irritations, body odors and is good for sensitive skin

name: Wine Soaps
description:
A few years ago, researchers discovered a nutrient in red wine called Resveratrol is very popular as a supplement. But if you’re one of the thousands who take it orally, you’re missing out on the distinct advantages it can offer your skin.
As you’ll soon see, when you apply this potent antioxidant directly to your skin, it quickly goes to work to reduce the appearance of aging from your body and face. Firms, Lifts, and Preserves Skin

name: Rosemary w/hints of Lavender
description:
Rosemary is uplifting and energizing. It makes a stimulating and soothing rub for arthritic conditions and aching muscles. Rosemary essential oil is also used in aromatherapy to treat headache, exhaustion, hormonal problems, and depression.

Contains: Shea Butter, Coconut Oil, Olive Oil, Palm Oil, Rosemary and Lavender E.O. Rosemary leaves and other natural ingredients

name: Patchouli
description:
Did you know patchouli is a plant? The familiar fragrance is derived from a distillation of the leaves of the patchouli plant into an essential oil, which is often used today in modern perfumery. The scent is rich and earthy, combining a floral sweetness.

Contains: Patchouli E.O. Coconut Oil, Shea Butter, Olive Oil, Palm Oil
NOTE: Shapes, Colors, Sizes and Apparance may varies

description:
•	Wrinkles, fine lines and scars repairing 
•	Antioxidant 
•	Anti-inflammatory 
•	Deeply moisturizing

•	Skin strengthening

•	Minor cuts and burns healing 
•	Muscle ache healing

Contains: 100% Pure Shea Butter from Africa, Coconut Oil, Olive Oil, Palm Oil and other Natural Ingredients

name: Oatmeal with Goats Milk Soap
description:
Goat milk contains important minerals for the skin such as Selenium which is believed by scientists to have an important role in preventing skin cancer. Also has many vitamins, but is particularly high in Vitamin A, which is necessary to repair damaged skin tissue, and maintain healthy skin. The cream that is present in goat milk helps boost the moisturizing quality of goat milk soaps. Since many people suffer from dry skin, particularly in the winter months.
The grainy texture of oatmeal makes it a perfect, natural scrub–and it won’t harm the environment! The friction of the grains helps to boost circulation and remove dead skin cells, while the soothing qualities of the oats calm and soften skin.

Contains: Pure 100% Goats Milk, Coconut Oil, Olive Oil, Palm Oil, Oats and Other Natural ingredients

Impress  every one with a unique Idea. Cut a slice your self for your Guest, Family and Friends as a gift, (can cut  between 22 to 30 slices depending size) perfect for holiday parties.... Quantity is Limited !!!!!

Note: Costume make your own Scents like: Rose, Lavender, Jasmine, Coffee, Mango, Pina Colada, Cinnamon, or any scent you like, up to 2 scents combined, please contact us for special Order

name: Charcoal (Activated)
description:
Charcoal, it's said, draws impurities and toxins out of the skin, helping to relieve acne and other skin problems. Is it effective? Possibly. Is it harmful? Almost  certainly not.  You'll need to experiment to see if charcoal soap can alleviate your Acne, Eczema, Rosessia, but you can do so confidently: Charcoal is proven to do no harm to humans, CONTAINS:
Aloe Vera Gel, Activated
Charcoal Pwdr, Castor Oil,
Olive Oil, Shea Butter
other Natural Ingredients

shea Butter:  	  Effective moisturizer because contains so many fatty acids, which are needed to retain skin moisture and elasticity.
